Infinite Leap is registered in Serbia and operates internationally. The company offers wide range of ICT services in areas of mobile software, web applications, bespoke software development, database and server side development. It provides also creative solutions in areas of digital marketing, branding and user experience/user interface (UI/UX) design.
 
Main fields of activity of the company are computer programming, consultancy and related services, building of web portals, custom web and mobile applications and software design services.  Currently the company works with multiple international startups from UK and Australia as well as established large companies from Europe and US. 
 
By positioning itself as end-to-end outsourcing company providing complete software development solution, software UI/UX design, branding and marketing strategy, the company is in a position to offer all necessary services to potential partners and cover all aspects of the product development.
